title: Aromatherapy, Crystal Healing and Reiki
author: Neil Padgett
description: Angel Therapies welcomes you into a calming haven of tranquillity.
cleaned_text: Holistic Therapies On visiting Angel Therapies you will be welcomed into a calming haven of tranquillity. The room is warm and inviting with a gentle spiritual energy that makes you feel instantly relaxed and calm from the moment you enter. You will be wrapped in warm blankets with calming music playing in the background and your treatment will be peaceful and unhurried to allow the healing energy to flow through to you. This is your time to relax and lose yourself from the outside world. feel wonderfully balanced and ready to face the stresses of life
